name: Fredoka
description: Fredoka is a big, round, bold font that is perfect for adding a little fun to any headline or large text. The initial Latin component was designed by Milena Brandão. The later Hebrew component was designed by Ben Nathan. Fredoka is a variable font with a width and weight axes. The Fredoka project is led by Ben Nathan, a type design foundry based in Israel. To contribute, see github.com/hafontia/Fredoka-One .
author: Milena Brandão, Hafontia
